Name: kushBans
Title: Beauty
Review: This aquarium has some really beautiful collection of fishes and tortoises. You can find the varieties and color to be amazing.

Name: ayushagarwal022
Title: nice and knowledgeable visit
Review: The visit was very knowledgeable. got to know about many different species of fish  and children enjoyed a lot.

Name: Shalu S
Title: Good place to go with kids
Review: I have been to this place many a times, and thoroughly enjoyed the fishes kept in aquariums. It's a small nice clean place, well maintained.

Name: Faizuddin H
Title: Good Aquarium
Review: They have variety of fishes and other sea animals. Ticket is very cheap. Their can be improvement in the interior of the building.Some of the aquarium were empty, however we saw totally new kind of fishes. Kids were very excited.They can have a theatre and run short films on life in Oceanside.

Name: P. V. Arul
Title: Ganga Aquarium, Lucknow
Review: The aquarium has some interesting specimens. But the upkeep needs a lot of improvement. The labelling & a brief explanations would a lot better.

Name: garhwalia1994
Title: Nice collection of fish
Review: They have nice collection of fishes and other living which live in water. They maintain them very much proper way. Worth place to go.

Name: credit356
Title: Need a  facelift
Review: This  aquarium  was a name to reckon with    in the  tourist  destinations. But  now due to  poor  maintenance, losing its attractions, It surely needs a facelift and  thereafter a good maintenance to  regain its lost charm

Name: abhayverma2007
Title: Ganga aquarium
Review: Not so good place, intead you can choose Lucknow Zoo and enjoy the aquarium. Not in good location, poor maintenace.

Name: sangeetasrivastava
Title: Ganga Aquarium - A new attraction in City of Nawabs
Review: The Ganga Aquarium is situated in lush green surroundings of NBFGR Campus, just near the main gate on Canal Ring Road.   With more than 40 large glass aquaria containing fish species from Africa, Asia and North and South America,etc., with attractive Feng Shui, deadly piranhas, tiny tetras, ornamental, goldfishes, Koi Carp, Angels, Alligator gar, Sting ray, Tetras, Ghostfish, Fire mouth, Malawi Cichlids, Malayan Angels and several other types of fishes and Indian ornamentals like  Kerala Queen, Flamingo barb, Loaches are special attraction for the children and students.
